H0.text: What was depicted on the reverse side of a pre-decimal halfpenny. Lion

H1.text: What was depicted on the reverse side of a pre-decimal halfpenny. Crown

H2.text: What was depicted on the reverse side of a pre-decimal halfpenny. Rose

H3.text: What was depicted on the reverse side of a pre-decimal halfpenny. SHIP

A4.text: From 1937 onwards the image of the Golden Hind appeared.
